HomePage.title: Next.js i18n Starter

hero.heading: Romanian Cultural Center in Norway
hero.description: Connecting the Romanian diaspora in Norway through cultural events, language courses, and community programs. Join us in celebrating our rich heritage while building bridges between cultures.

HomePage.description: A modern starter template with internationalization, beautiful UI components, and type safety built in.

nextjs.title: Next.js 15
nextjs.description: Built on the latest Next.js with App Router and React 19 for optimal performance.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Full i18n support with next-intl for seamless multilingual experiences.

design.title: Beautiful Design
design.description: Tailwind CSS with custom colors and Shadcn UI components for a polished look.

content.paragraph1: This starter template demonstrates the power of combining modern web technologies to create a fast, accessible, and maintainable application.
content.paragraph2: Built with developer experience in mind, this project provides a solid foundation for building internationalized web applications with best practices baked in.

items.nextjs: Next.js 15 with App Router and React 19
items.tailwind: Tailwind CSS with custom Navy, Gold, and Ice palette
items.shadcn: Shadcn UI components built on Radix UI
